quest.name: If It's Broke, Fix It
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol seeks to preserve the legacy of the Ronkans by gluing it back together again.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid clay in Mjrl's RegretDeliver the splendid clay to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid trilliums in Mjrl's RegretDeliver the splendid trilliums to Qhoterl PasolSpearfish a splendid cockle in Lake Tusi Mek'taDeliver the splendid cockle to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: We've uncovered all sorts of precious relics, although some are in better condition than others.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: As such, many of these artifacts are in desperate need of repair, which is where our special adhesive comes in particularly handy. Sadly, we've just run out, and need to prepare a fresh batch.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: If you're feeling charitable, could I trouble you for a few lumps of clay? I'd be ever so grateful for any assistance you can provide!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: If you're feeling charitable, could I trouble you for a few trilliums? I'd be ever so grateful for any assistance you can provide!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Cockles are an essential ingredient in the mixture, but they're rather difficult to catch, so you'll need to get close and use a spear or some such to prise it from the rock. I'd be ever so grateful for any assistance you can provide!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I'm told there are ample amounts in Mjrl's Regret, which is not the easiest of places for us Qitari to reach. Presumably you have some means of getting there more quickly?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I'm told there are ample amounts in Mjrl's Regret, which is not the easiest of places for us Qitari to reach. Presumably you have some means of getting there more quickly?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I'm told that Lake Tusi Mek'ta is positively lousy with the things, though we Qitari are not especially well suited to swimming in deep water. We're just too buoyant for our own good!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Oh my, this is perfection itself! Those priceless pots shall remain shattered no longer!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: While some may argue that the relics should be kept as we find them, I'd much rather see them restored to their original state, as the ancient Ronkans intended them. Besides, who would want to look at a pile of broken fragments?
